name: Kokusai Island Iced Tea
description: The classic Long Island Iced Tea with a Japanese twist
directions: Use a Mexican Elbow to squize the juice from the lemon in the shaker.
Add all other ingredients except the cola in a shaker.
Fill a highball glass and the other half of the shaker with ice.
Add cola to the highball glass
Carefully fine strain pour the shaker on top of the cola, this will create a nice contrast between the black cola and white alcohol.
Garnish with slice of lemon and branch of mint and add bamboo straw.
